eksath jathinge dutha mandalaya jathika aarakshawata madihath weyilowa kisima ratak siya aarakshaka hamuda mulasthanayak wideshiyanta wimarshanaya kirimata ida denne natha.eheth shri lanka aarakshaka hamuda ithihasaye mulwarata eksath jathinge kandayamak thrikunamala nawika hamuda mulasthanayata pamina wadha kandawurak thibedayi pariksha kalaha.mema eksath jathinge dutha kandayama thrikunamala nawika hamuda mulasthanayata gena aawe rahas polisiyayi.eki dutha kandama nawika hamuda mulasthanaye parana godanangillak pariksha kara kolambaata gos barapathala prakashayak karanu labiya.
